edge_1: Nicolas Cage's character Johnny Blaze makes a deal with the demon lord Mephisto, thinking it will save his father from dying.
edge_2: Nicolas Cage portrays the character of Johnny Blaze, a motorcycle stuntman who makes a deal with Mephisto to save his father from dying.

edge_1: Brett Cullen portrays Barton Blaze, who is Johnny Blaze's deceased father and a former motorcycle stuntman.
edge_2: Barton Blaze is Johnny Blaze's deceased father.
